item-1.question: Can the Dog Translator really make dogs understand?
item-1.answer: Dog Translator is an entertainment and educational tool. While dogs do respond to different tones of sounds, the main purpose of this tool is to help owners understand how to communicate with pets using different emotional tones, adding fun to human-pet interaction.

item-2.question: How does AI recognize emotions?
item-2.answer: We use Gemini's advanced natural language processing technology to analyze multiple dimensions of text such as semantics, word choice, and punctuation to determine the emotional tendencies contained in the text, then match corresponding dog bark sound effects.

item-3.question: Does Dog Translator require payment?
item-3.answer: Completely free! No registration or subscription required. Just open the webpage and start using it. We want every dog owner to enjoy this fun experience.

item-4.question: What languages are supported?
item-4.answer: Currently supports Chinese and English input. The AI can accurately understand emotional expressions in these two languages. We plan to support more languages in the future.

item-5.question: Can I use it on my phone?
item-5.answer: Absolutely! Dog Translator uses responsive design and perfectly adapts to phones, tablets, and computers. You can use it anywhere as long as you have an internet connection.

whatIs.title: What is Dog Translator?
whatIs.description: Dog Translator is an innovative AI-powered tool that analyzes the emotional content of your text and converts it into appropriate dog barking sounds. Using advanced natural language processing, it detects whether you're expressing happiness, giving commands, showing affection, or communicating other emotions, then plays authentic dog bark sounds that match that emotional tone. While designed for entertainment and education, it helps dog owners better understand how tone and emotion affect communication with their pets, making every interaction more meaningful and fun.

unique.title: What Makes Us Special
unique.subtitle: Where cutting-edge technology and playful innovation come together in a Dog Translator
unique.description: Our Dog Translator stands out with unique features you won't find anywhere else.

items.title: AI Emotion Intelligence
items.description: Powered by Gemini's latest natural language models, our system understands nuanced emotions in your text. It doesn't just translate words—it captures your intent, whether you're praising, commanding, comforting, or playing with your dog. The AI analyzes sentence structure, word choice, punctuation, and context to deliver the most accurate emotional interpretation.

items.title: Authentic Sound Library in the Dog Translator
items.description: We've curated a comprehensive library of real dog barking sounds covering every mood and scenario. From excited yips to authoritative woofs, gentle whines to playful growls—each emotion has multiple variations that play randomly, ensuring a fresh and realistic experience every time. No robotic sounds, just genuine canine communication.
